WGSLLanguageFeatures.summary: The WGSLLanguageFeatures interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} is a setlike object that reports the WGSL language extensions supported by the WebGPU implementation.

remarks.para: The WGSLLanguageFeatures object is accessed via the property.

blockquote.para: Note: Not all WGSL language extensions are available to WebGPU in all browsers that support the API. We recommend you thoroughly test any extensions you choose to use.
